categorization.title: AI Categorization
categorization.completed: AI categorized {count} transaction | AI categorized {count} transactions

recoveryMethod.title: Add a backup login method
recoveryMethod.description: Protect your account by adding Google sign-in or a passkey. This ensures you can always access your account.

relinkWarning.buttonLabel: {count} account needs attention | {count} accounts need attention
relinkWarning.title: Enable Banking: Action Required
relinkWarning.description: These Enable Banking accounts need to be updated due to a data schema change. This is a one-time action to improve synchronization reliability.
relinkWarning.step1Full: To save your time, firstly try reconnecting the whole bank connection. You can find a {reconnect} button under the {connectionValidity} section on each connection page:
relinkWarning.step2Full: If any accounts remain listed below after reconnection, go to each account and manually {unlink} then {link} again.

legacyAccountMigrationDialog.verificationSentDescription: We've sent a verification link to {email}. Please click the link to confirm your new email address.
legacyAccountMigrationDialog.loginAgainAfterVerification: After verification, you'll need to log in again with your new email.
legacyAccountMigrationDialog.signOutAndLogin: Sign Out & Log in with new email
legacyAccountMigrationDialog.legacyLoginWarning: Your account uses a legacy username-based login. Please add an email address to continue using your account.
legacyAccountMigrationDialog.migrationWarning: Without updating your login method, your account data may become corrupted or inaccessible in future updates.
legacyAccountMigrationDialog.emailPrivacy: Your email will only be used for login purposes and won't be shared or used for marketing.
legacyAccountMigrationDialog.usernameLoginAfterMigration: After migration, you will no longer be able to log in with your username. Use your email instead, or connect OAuth accounts (Google) for easier access.

onboarding.title: Welcome to MoneyMatter
onboarding.subtitle: Get started by setting up your first account

createManualAccount.title: Create Manual Account
createManualAccount.description: Track cash, savings, or any account manually

connectBank.title: Connect Your Bank
connectBank.description: Automatically sync transactions from your bank

importFile.title: Import from File
importFile.description: Import transactions from bank statements (PDF) or CSV files

create-account.title: Create your first account
create-account.description: Add a bank account or wallet to track

create-tag.title: Create a tag
create-tag.description: Add tags to group related transactions

create-account-group.title: Create an account group
create-account-group.description: Organize accounts by type or purpose

import-csv.title: Import from any text source
import-csv.description: Import from CSV, PDF, or bank statements

configure-ai.title: Set your own API key
configure-ai.description: Use your AI API key for the unlimited and uninterrupted access

ui.title: Quick Start
ui.subtitle: Use our Quick Start guide to learn about everything MoneyMatter can do for you.
ui.dismissConfirmDescription: You can always reopen the Quick Start guide from settings if you change your mind.
ui.srDescription: Complete these tasks to get started with the app
